thread.title: Chargers Fall to Steelers at Qualcomm Stadium
thread.title_full: Chargers Fall to Steelers at Qualcomm Stadium

author: DEREK TOGERSON
title: Chargers Fall to Steelers at Qualcomm Stadium
text: Privacy Policy | More Newsletters Getty Images SAN DIEGO, CA - OCTOBER 12: Quarterback Mike Vick #2 of the Pittsburgh Steelers takes part in pre-game warm ups before a game against the San Diego Chargers at Qualcomm Stadium on October 12, 2015 in San Diego, California. (Photo by Jeff Gross/Getty Images) In a close game, the San Diego Chargers fell to the Pittsburgh Steelers 24-20. Refresh this page for updates on this breaking news story. Weekend Brings Heat Wave, Advisory Published 2 minutes ago
